summary: Before an American company can build a smelting plant outside a small Irish village, they have to send their top troubleshooter to find a way around an antiquated law that protects the leprechauns supposedly living on the property.
cast: Adrian Pasdar|Amy Huberman|Sean Duggan|Frank O'Sullivan|Pascal Scott|Kate Stanley Brennan|Terry Byrne|Emmet Bergin|Aidan McArdle|Marion O'Dwyer|Jack Reynor|Jonathan Ryan|Aoibhinn McGinnity|Colin Stinton|Donna Dent
title: Chasing Leprechauns
